name: Data Lab
description:
Paste random or real data into text layers and components easily. Data Lab supports Numbers, Names, Dates, Addreses, Phones, Emails and Lists with data from API or Google Sheet.


How to use:

1. Run Data Lab

2. Select text layers or components

3. Construct content query with any symbols and variables

4. Click Paste data


Advanced features:

1. Names, Dates and Geo locations in English and Russian

2. Upload data from API or shared Google Sheet via LIST variable


Roadmap:

1. [PRO] Customize formats for variables

2. [PRO] Add your own data sets and manage them

3. [PRO] Automatically generate content for layers based on layer name

4. Upload data from CSV and JSON


Feature requests and support:

Feel free to ping me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pavelkuligin93
